SourceString: With great power and can be relied upon\nto protect his allies both offensively\nand defensively.
Healing spell specialist.\nAlso good at attacking with strong weapons.
An attack spell specialist who annihilates\nenemies with powerful magic.
A strongest tension user with excellent\npower and speed.
A professional treasure hunter with\nstrong powers and good recovery skills.
A mood maker who enlivens the mood\nwith various tricks.
An attacker who abandons defense and attacks.\nCan also dual wield weapons.
A benevolent knight who uses various\nspecial skills to protect their friends.
A magical warrior who can use spells\nand force to strengthen allies.
A warrior who lives in the great outdoors,\neven with monsters.
A saint who trains and gains enlightenment,\ncan also use the powers of gods.
With her overflowing charm, both I and\nmy girlfriend are in climax fever!
A supernatural person who has acquired the\nmysterious skill of fighting with monsters\nas allies.
Battles by drawing out the effects of tools.\nRecruits specific monsters as allies.
Supports allies with songs and dances.\nCan also dual wield weapons.
A mysterious guide of fate who fights\nusing the Monster Tarot.
Control nature and weather and summon\nGenma to fight together.
Play with all your might!\nThat's all.
